ai.summary: Gunwalloe BR 9 is a short, easy hike in the United Kingdom. At about 1.3 km, it’s ideal for families and casual walkers seeking a quick, scenic outing.
ai.terrain_summary: The route follows a gentle, well-maintained path with mostly flat terrain, combining compact gravel, grassy sections, and occasional uneven ground. Expect a few gentle slopes and occasional roots.
ai.safety_notes: Coastal paths can be slippery when wet; wear sturdy footwear. Be mindful of tides and changing weather; stay on marked trails and away from cliff edges. Carry a light rain jacket, water, and a small first aid kit. Let someone know your plan, and avoid the route in poor visibility or high winds.
ai.best_seasons: Spring and summer are ideal, but the trail can be enjoyed year-round with proper clothing and footwear.

seo.title: Gunwalloe BR 9: Easy 1.3 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Gunwalloe BR 9, a short and easy 1.3 km hike in the UK. Perfect for families and casual hikers, with terrain notes and practical safety tips.
